apiClassifier.shortdesc: The Surface3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Surface3D-type objects.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The Surface3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Surface3D-type objects.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The Pivot3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Pivot3D-type objects.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The Pivot3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Pivot3D-type objects.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Add animation frames and labels to source pivot from another pivot, including children.

apiParam.apiDesc: Pivot who want to append the animations.
The pivot that contains the animations to add to dest pivot.
Optionally, you can set a new label name to define the appened animation.
If materials has animated parameters, they will be append.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Add animation frames and labels to source pivot from another pivot, including children.
The pivot names and hierarchy must be the same.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Points the object direction towards a given position using a reference object.

apiParam.apiDesc: Reference object position on the x axis.
Reference object position on the Y axis.
Reference object position on the Z axis.
Object to be used as referente for "x", "y" and "z" parameters.
Vector3D corresponding to the direction of the object upper side. If omitted, the default value (0, 1, 0) will be used.
Optional interpolation value towards final transformation (0-1).

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Points the object direction towards a given position using a reference object. The coordinates used correspond to the local space of the 'reference' parameter.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Positions an object using another as reference.

apiParam.apiDesc: Reference object position on the X axis.
Reference object position on the Y axis.
Reference object position on the Z axis.
Object to be used as reference.
Optional interpolation value towards final transformation (0-1).

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Positions an object using another as reference.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns information about an object and its properties at the Flash output.

apiParam.apiDesc: 'true' if information about the materials is to be included.
'true' if all the hierarchy is to be included.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns information about an object and its properties at the Flash output.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The Mesh3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Mesh3D-type objects.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The Mesh3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Mesh3D-type objects.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Split the surfaces of the mesh if they exceds the limit of the buffer size.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Split the surfaces of the mesh if they exceds the limit of the buffer size.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The Vector3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Vector3D-type objects.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The Vector3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Vector3D-type objects.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Calculates the sum of two vectors.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the result will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Vector3D-type object where the result is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Calculates the sum of two vectors.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Calculates the crossed product of two vectors.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the result will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Vector3D-type object where the result is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Calculates the crossed product of two vectors.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Calculates the interpolation between two vectors.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the result will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Vector where the result is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Calculates the interpolation between two vectors.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Calculates the squared length between two vectors.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Distance aquared between vectors 'a' and 'b'.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Calculates the squared length between two vectors.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Calculates the length between two vectors.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Distance between vectors 'a' and 'b'.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Calculates the length between two vectors.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the vector mirrored with respect to another.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the result will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Source vector that is to be mirrored.
Plane normal on which the source vector is to be mirrored.
Vector where the result is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the vector mirrored with respect to another.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Calculates the inverse vector of another vector.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the result will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Vector where the result is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Calculates the inverse vector of another vector.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Fills a vector with random numbers in a defined range.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the result will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Minimum number that values can hold.
Maximum number that values can hold.
Vector where the result is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Fills a vector with random numbers in a defined range.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sets a scale for a vector.

apiParam.apiDesc: Vector whose scale is to be set.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sets a scale for a vector.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Calculates the subtraction of two vectors.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the result will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Vector3D-type object where the result is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Calculates the subtraction of two vectors.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sets the values for a vector.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sets the values for a vector.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The Texture3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Texture3D or BitmapData-type objects.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The Texture3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Texture3D or BitmapData-type objects.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The Matrix3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Matrix3D-type objects.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The Matrix3DUtils class contains help tools to work with Matrix3D-type objects.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Transforms a given point multiplying it by a matrix, but without considering translation.

apiParam.apiDesc: Matrix that will be used to transform the point.
Vector3D that represents the point to be transformed.
Vector3D where the transformed point is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Transforms a given point multiplying it by a matrix, but without considering translation.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns 'true' if 'a' and 'b' matrices are equal.

apiReturn.apiDesc: 'true' if they are equal.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns 'true' if 'a' and 'b' matrices are equal.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the direction vector pointing to the back side of the matrix.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the direccion will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Output vector3D where the direction of the right vector of the matrix is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the direction vector pointing to the back side of the matrix.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the dirección vector pointing to the front side of the matrix.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the direction will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Output vector3D where the direction of the front vector of the matrix is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the dirección vector pointing to the front side of the matrix.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the dirección vector pointing to the bottom side of the matrix.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the direction will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Output vector3D where the direction of the front vector of the matrix is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the dirección vector pointing to the bottom side of the matrix.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the dirección vector pointing to the left side of the matrix.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the direction will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Output vector3D where the direction of the front vector of the matrix is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the dirección vector pointing to the left side of the matrix.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a matrix position.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' is 'null', a new Vector3D with the position will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Output vector3D where the matrix position is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a matrix position.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the direction vector pointing to the right side of the matrix.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the direccion will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Output vector3D where the direction of the right vector of the matrix is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the direction vector pointing to the right side of the matrix.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the current rotation of the object in euler angles.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the rotation will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Output vector3D where the matrix rotation is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the current rotation of the object in euler angles.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a matrix scale.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new vector3D with the scale will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Output vector3D where the matrix scale is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a matrix scale.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the direction vector pointing to the upper side of the matrix.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' parameter is 'null', a new Vector3D with the direction will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Output vector3D where the direction of the upper vector of the matrix is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the direction vector pointing to the upper side of the matrix.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Inverts a matrix3D.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' is 'null', a new matrix will be returned. Otherwise, the same matrix, passed to the 'out' parameter, will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Matrix where the inverted matrix is returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Inverts a matrix3D.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Directs the object towards the specified position.

apiParam.apiDesc: Vector3D related to the direction of the upper side of the object. The default value is (0, 1, 0).
Optional interpolation value towards final transformation (0-1).

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Directs the object towards the specified position. Coordinates are related to the local space of the object.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Resets the matrix position.

apiParam.apiDesc: Matrix whose position is to be reset.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Resets the matrix position. The position is to be set to (0,0,0).

apiOperation.shortdesc: Resets the matrix rotation.

apiParam.apiDesc: Matrix whose rotation is to be reset.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Resets the matrix rotation. The rotation is to be set to (0,0,0).

apiOperation.shortdesc: Resets a matrix scale.

apiParam.apiDesc: Matrix whose scale is to be reset.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Resets a matrix scale. The scale is to be set to (1,1,1).

apiOperation.shortdesc: Rotates the object on the specified axis from its current position.

apiParam.apiDesc: Direction vector or axis on which to rotate.
Position vector that sets an anchoring point for rotation. The position must be expressed in local units.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Rotates the object on the specified axis from its current position. The pivotPoint parameter can be used to rotate around a point.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Rotates the matrix on the X axis from its current position.

apiParam.apiDesc: true to rotate respecting current orientation, or false to rotate according to orientation relative to parent.
Position vector that sets an anchoring point for rotation. The position must be expressed in local units.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Rotates the matrix on the X axis from its current position. The pivotPoint parameter can be used to rotate around a point.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Rotates the matrix on the Y axis from its current position.

apiParam.apiDesc: true to rotate respecting current orientation, or false to rotate according to orientation relative to parent.
Position vector that sets an anchoring point for rotation. The position must be expressed in local units.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Rotates the matrix on the Y axis from its current position. The pivotPoint parameter can be used to rotate around a point.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Rotates the matrix on the Z axis from its current position.

apiParam.apiDesc: true to rotate respecting current orientation, or false to rotate according to orientation relative to parent.
Position vector that sets an anchoring point for rotation. The position must be expressed in local units.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Rotates the matrix on the Z axis from its current position. The pivotPoint parameter can be used to rotate around a point.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Increases or decreases the matrix scale on the X axis.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Increases or decreases the matrix scale on the X axis. Use a value greater than one to increase or less than one to decrease. Setting the scale to 2 means that objects will be scaled to twice their original size, whereas a value of 0.5 would scale objects to one half of their original size.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Increases or decreases the matrix scale on the Y axis.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Increases or decreases the matrix scale on the Y axis. Use a value greater than one to increase or less than one to decrease. Setting the scale to 2 means that objects will be scaled to twice their original size, whereas a value of 0.5 would scale objects to one half of their original size.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Increases or decreases the matrix scale on the Z axis.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Increases or decreases the matrix scale on the Z axis. Use a value greater than one to increase or less than one to decrease. Setting the scale to 2 means that objects will be scaled to twice their original size, whereas a value of 0.5 would scale objects to one half of their original size.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Aligns the object to a normal.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Aligns the object to a normal.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Orients the object in a specific direction.

apiParam.apiDesc: Upper side of the object. The default value is (0,1,0).

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Orients the object in a specific direction.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a matrix position.

apiReturn.apiDesc: If the 'out' is 'null', a new Vector3D with the position will be returned. Otherwise, the same vector passed to the 'out' parameter will be returned.

apiParam.apiDesc: Output vector3D where the matrix position is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a matrix position.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Rotates a matrix using euler angles.

apiParam.apiDesc: Rotation on X axis in angles.
Rotation on Y axis in angles.
Rotation on Z axis in angles.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Rotates a matrix using euler angles. Rotation is absolute; therefore, any previous rotation is to be omitted.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sets the object scale.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sets the object scale. This method sets the scale in an absolute manner; therefore, any previous scale will be ignored. Default value is 1, use a value greater than one to increase or less than 1 to decrease the scale. Setting the scale to 2 means that objects will be scaled to twice their original size, whereas a value of 0.5 would scale objects to one half of their original size.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Translates the object from its current position to the specified distance.

apiParam.apiDesc: Distance in units to translate on X axis.
Distance in units to translate on Y axis.
Distance in units to translate on Z axis.
true to translate respecting current orientation or false to translate on the coordinates relative to the parent.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Translates the object from its current position to the specified distance.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Transforms a given point multiplying it by a matrix.

apiParam.apiDesc: Matrix that will be used to transform the point.
Vector3D that represents the point to be transformed.
out Vector3D where the transformed point is to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Transforms a given point multiplying it by a matrix.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Translates the object on a certain axis from its current position.

apiParam.apiDesc: Direction vector or axis on which to translate.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Translates the object on a certain axis from its current position.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Translates the object on the X axis from its current position.

apiParam.apiDesc: true to translate respecting current orientation, or false to translate on the coordinates relative to parent.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Translates the object on the X axis from its current position.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Translates the object on the Y axis from its current position.

apiParam.apiDesc: true to translate respecting current orientation, or false to translate on the coordinates relative to parent.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Translates the object on the Y axis from its current position.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Translates the object on the Z axis from its current position.

apiParam.apiDesc: true to translate respecting current orientation, or false to translate on the coordinates relative to parent.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Translates the object on the Z axis from its current position.
